document_data.name: Tailors' Federation
document_data.mainbody: The '''Tailors' Federation''' was the guildhall for tailors in the city of [[Daggerford]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|3990 Daggerford}}
document_data.Location: The guildhall was located at the junction of the [[High Road (Daggerford)|High Road]] and the [[Trade Way (Daggerford)|Trade Way]] in central of Daggerford near the northeast corner of the drill field.
document_data.Description: The three story building was in a general state of disrepair as the guild didn't have the funds to restore it. The interior of the first floor was decorated with fine art objects.
